name: Hotel Riu Cancun

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place is alright. I'm sure there are better places in Cancun. I traveled with my fiance, and we wouldn't recommend it to another couple looking for a relaxing, private, quiet time.
reviews.title: Just "okay"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we went in October 2008, and the place was pretty full. The all inclusive food is not great. With a cafeteria-like atmosphere, people are everywhere loading their plates with food, butting in line, barefoot, and wet from the pool. There are a couple higher-end dining options, but you have to wake up early in the morning and go to the lobby in order to get your name on the reservation list, because it fills up. We did two mornings, and the food at these specialty restaruants is slightly better than the buffet food.
reviews.title: best place ever!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The booze hounds trying to take full advantage of the all inclusive bar, really do. I'm not criticizing them, because I've been there before. As I stated earlier, for a quiet, nice time, don't go here. If all you care about is boozing all day at the pool and getting up to eat every once in a while, then drinking some more, you'll probably like this place. We did enjoy the lobby bar for several hours while it was storming outside (the Jose Cuervo shots were flowing).
reviews.title: This hotel is Amazing!!! Do not believe everything that you read on tripadvisor...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The nightly entertainment is okay. There are some dance and game shows, but nothing out of this world.
reviews.title: Ignore the bad reviews,had a wonderful time.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is no air conditioning, so public areas are sticky and humid.
reviews.title: Far too many people in one place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had read the reviews on the internet and were a bit worried to what we had let ourselves in for. How wrong could we have been.
reviews.title: fantastic relaxing holiday

reviews.text: On arrival at the hotel we were shown to a room where we were given a drink and our keys to our room(422).
reviews.title: More details about the RIU Cancun

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is kept very clean the staff can not do enough for you.
reviews.title: GREAT HOTEL

reviews.text: Our room was clean comfortable and cool(good AC).
reviews.title: fantastic hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All I can say about the food is anyone going into the restaurant and coming out without having something to eat there must be something wrong with you.
reviews.title: Average Hotel, spend a little more and get better food.

reviews.text: Just came back today.. (Sept.27, 2009). I do have high standards and should not have gone to all inclusive deals. Anyway, food tasted the same every meal. There were a lot of it but on a third day we hated even the smell of that buffet.
reviews.title: Far from perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Actually, smell was my main complaint. Rooms smelled of mold (I know - oceanfront property and all) and blankets we pulled out of a closet were so stinky, I would wake up few times a night because of that smell. I guess they were washed once and never completely dried.
reviews.title: 2nd time around...even more amazing!!
A perfect trip
reviews.text: Staff is friendly and helpfull, beach was good and made up for the bad food and smelly interiors. Won't go back. I guess we will stick with Marriott and such. You get what you pay for...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: ive jus returned from 2 weeks in the riu cancun, my 2nd time back as i went in may 2004. there is nothing negative i could say about this place, everything is amazing - the staff are so friendly, the hotel immaculate and the food never disapointed with so much variety, not to mention the cocktails! the rooms are lovely with comfy beds and the most beautiful views over the beach or lagoon. theres 4 pools, with the most relaxing 1 being round the back, all you hear is the sea..and the livelier pools are round the front which are great too! im 27 and loved it, took my mum whos 51 and she loved it, doesnt matter the age its jus heavenly there. cant wait to book up for my 3rd time back there.. it really is a slice of heaven for 2 weeks...
reviews.title: Wonderful stay....beautiful hotel and beach.

reviews.text: Stayed at the Riu cancun august 2009 and it was amazing. From the minute we arrived in the hotel we had cocktails thrust in our hands. The service for this hotel was out of this world, the staff couldn't have been more friendlier and helpful if they tried. Rooms were comfortable, people complain about the beds being hard but it never affected me or my boyfriend. Air con was amazing it would sometimes get so cold i'd have to put a jumper on which is a nice relife from the heat outside. I would reccommend getting a room on the lower floors. We stayed on the 6th floor which was perfect because the view was amazing but any higher than this you would spend half your holiday wainting for the lifts as they are quite slow.
reviews.title: Far beyond expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There's not much more that I can say than the rest of the reviews on here. We spent a week in September and had a fantastic time. The food was good (not amazing - but we weren't expecting amazing), the rooms were large, and the location was fantastic. Oh, and the beach was absolutely beautiful.
reviews.title: Great value for a fantastic time.
Hotel great, food not so great
reviews.text: Our only complaints:
1) The beds. Yes, everyone else complained about them as well.
reviews.title: Excellent for the price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2) The housekeeping and staff. They would knock and then barge right into the room without waiting. Keep your deadbolt on unless you want them to see you coming out of the shower.
reviews.title: The only review you need...good & bad

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 3) The "Nightclub". You could hear crickets on a Friday and Saturday night - nevermind the other nights.
reviews.title: had the time of my life

description: Located in "Corazone", Cancun's resort area. 14-storey main building and a 5-storey annex building. On the beachfront. Complimentary sun loungers on the beach. 20 m/65 ft. from a shopping centre. 10 km/6.2 miles from downtown Cancun. 20 km/12.5 miles from Cancun Int'l. Airport. Credit cards accepted: MasterCard, Amex, Visa
